thread.title: Mona Hengelsberg
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Mona Hengelsberg

author: Mona Hengelsberg
title: Mona Hengelsberg
text:
Hi Patrick!
I wanted to let you know what a wonderful time we had during our recent trip to the French Polynesian.
All of the transportation and connections went smoothly, the accommodations on both islands were fantastic (especially LOVED the over-the-water bungalows), and the food was delicious! (Now I have to lose a few pounds to get back into my winter clothes). Also, the extra details like the greeting with “flower leis”, basket of Local Products, beautiful complimentary “Pareo” wrap, and Resort Credit all added to our exceptional experience and did not go unnoticed.
Thank you again so very much for all of your efforts and taking such good care of us. Please be assured that if I am fortunate enough to return to the South Pacific, you will be my first call!
